agents.name: Customer Success Agent
agents.description: Monitors account health scores, usage trends, and proactively flags churn risks

agents.name: Bug Triager
agents.description: Categorises incoming bug reports, assigns severity, identifies duplicates, and tracks resolution SLAs

agents.name: Onboarding Specialist
agents.description: Guides new users through setup, tracks activation milestones, and escalates stalled onboardings
